meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading my favorite monthlies every month.
meanings.sent2: The library has a wide selection of monthlies for everyone to borrow.
meanings.sent3: I forgot to return my monthlies to the library on time!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of monthlies is like a treasure trove of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The colorful covers of the monthlies always catch my eye.

meanings.sent1: She keeps track of her monthlies on a calendar.
meanings.sent2: Some women experience discomfort during their monthlies.
meanings.sent3: Oops, I stained my pants during my monthlies!
meanings.sent4: Her mood swings during her monthlies are like a rollercoaster.
meanings.sent5: The arrival of her monthlies was a relief after days of waiting.
